thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Capita's Life, Pensions Business Administration To be Transferred From Capita

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capita's Life, Pensions Business Administration To be Transferred From Capita
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Capita Plc:
* ‍ANNOUNCED THAT ADMINISTRATION OF ITS LIFE AND PENSIONS BUSINESS WILL BE TRANSFERRING FROM CAPITA TO A NEW SUPPLIER ON 31ST JULY 2018​
* ‍CAPITA WILL CONTINUE TO ADMINISTER PRUDENTIAL‘S INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS​
* LIFE AND PENSIONS OPERATIONS ARE EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE REVENUE OF AROUND £80M TO CAPITA IN FULL YEAR TO DECEMBER 2017. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
